content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 10}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 30}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft lime_wool, I first need to craft lime_dye. Lime_dye can be crafted from a sea_pickle, which is at slot 11. Therefore I will smelt the sea_pickle at slot 11 into slot 14.
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 30}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: I now need to craft lime_wool. Lime_wool can be crafted from lime_dye and white_wool, which are at slots 14 and 35 respectively. Therefore I will move the lime_dye from slot 14 into slot 1.
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 30}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the lime_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white_wool to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_wool to slot 2.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_wool
inventory=[{"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 63, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 30}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 21, "index": 33}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 56, "index": 36}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the lime_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
